originalText.text: I went to Ambiance on Lex to retouch my color and I was very happy as the lady did exactly what I was looking for. The hair stylist was also really good and I left the salon extremely happy. Will go back for sure!

text.text: I went to Ambiance on Lex to retouch my color and I was very happy as the lady did exactly what I was looking for. The hair stylist was also really good and I left the salon extremely happy. Will go back for sure!

originalText.text:
DO NOT GO HERE

This was the worst hair salon experience I‚Äôve had in my life. It‚Äôs not nice at all inside and I couldn‚Äôt see barbicide being used for any of the tools.
I arrived and the guy cutting my hair pointed me to the sink and told me to get my hair washed. A different person (a lady) very very aggressively washed my hair. Then told me to go to the chair. He put a gown on me and started sectioning my hair in big chunks. He was ripping my hair apart at the ends because of the tangles and each time the hair was slapping my face. He was so aggressive with the comb it was actually very painful. There was no detangler or cream used.
So he made a few cuts wet. Then told me he would dry it and finish it.

No heat protectant was used. He blasted the hair dryer on my hair, giving me a ‚Äúblowout‚Äù with my hair actually steaming the entire time.
He made a couple of more useless cuts. Then said I was done.
I think online it priced the haircut as $75. When he checked me out he didn‚Äôt ask if I liked it or really say anything.

He charged my card $107. There was no option for tip.

My hair is now completely fried and it looks virtually the same. For $107.

I arrived at 3:23 and was done by 3:59.

Run from this place.

originalText.text: This is a wonderful salon, I highly recommend it. Paul is a gifted stylist and colorist and will make you feel like you‚Äôve known him for years. My teenage daughter is a huge fan of Paul‚Äôs as well. He creates very subtle highlights that frame her face.  I‚Äôve also been to Vicky and she does an awesome blow out with strict attention to detail. I‚Äôve always had great results with them and this salon is very fresh and inviting. You won‚Äôt be disappointed.

originalText.text: Poor quality, Poor value, big liars and not a professional. I‚Äôm extremely disappointed by the treatment. My hair are curly and frizzy. When I went to this Ambiance on lex salon for hair smoothing treatment manager told me that treatment lasts four to six months. Their treatment gave me no results at all. After the treatment, right after my first wash I see my hair back to curly and frizzy, as if nothing was done at all on my hairs. It is just a waste of your time and money. I will never never recommend this salon to anyone.
